name: Farfetch’d
author: miki kudo
flavor_text: The stalk this Pokémon carries in its wings serves as a sword to cut down opponents. In a dire situation, the stalk can also serve as food.

abilities.name: Impromptu Carrier
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may search your deck for a Pokémon Tool card and attach it to this Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Mach Cut
attacks.effect: Discard a Special Energy from your opponent’s Active Pokémon.
